alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson; McDonough; Mercer; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:44PM CDT until May 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR HANCOCK...HENDERSON...WARREN...NORTHERN MCDONOUGH...SOUTH CENTRAL MERCER...CENTRAL DES MOINES AND LEE COUNTIES... At 744 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Delong to Montrose, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Macomb, Fort Madison, Keokuk, Monmouth, Carthage, Oquawka, Nauvoo, Bushnell, West Burlington, Hamilton, Colchester, La Harpe, Roseville, West Point, Dallas City, Donnellson, Montrose, Stronghurst and Kirkwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
